system:
note description: "Eiffel Vision cell, GTK+ implementation." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2017-03-27 13:31:29 -0700 (Mon, 27 Mar 2017) $" revision: "$Revision: 100058 $"
class ../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xmlEV_CELL_IMP
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_cell_i.xmlEV_CELL_I undefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_propagate_foreground_colorpropagate_foreground_color, ../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_propagate_background_colorpropagate_background_color redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xmlEV_CONTAINER_IMP redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xml#f_replacereplace, ../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xml#f_makemake end
../implementation_gtk/ev_dockable_target_imp.xmlEV_DOCKABLE_TARGET_IMP redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
create ../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xml#f_makemake
feature -- initialization
f_old_make../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xml#f_old_makeold_make (an_interface: attached like ../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface) -- Connect interface and initialize ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_c_objectc_object. do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_assign_interfaceassign_interface (an_interface) end
f_make../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xml#f_makemake -- Creation routine and initialization for Current. do if ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_c_objectc_object = Falsedefault_pointer then ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_set_c_objectset_c_object ({../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_event_box_newgtk_event_box_new) end ../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_makePrecursor end
feature -- Access
f_has../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xml#f_hashas (v: like ../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xml#f_itemitem): FalseBOOLEAN -- Does Current include v? do Result := not ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed and (v /= Void and then ../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xml#f_itemitem = v) end
f_item../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xml#f_itemitem: detachable ../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET -- Current item.
f_count../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xml#f_countcount: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Number of elements in Current. do if ../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xml#f_itemitem /= Void then Result := 1 end end
feature -- Element change
f_replace../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xml#f_replacereplace (v: like ../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xml#f_itemitem) -- Replace ../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xml#f_itemitem with v. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_replacePrecursor {../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xmlEV_CONTAINER_IMP} (v) ../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xml#f_itemitem := v end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_cell.xmlEV_CELL note option: stable attribute end
note copyright: "Copyright (c) 1984-2017, Eiffel Software and others" license: "Eiffel Forum License v2 (see http://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txthttp://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txt)" source: "[ Eiffel Software 5949 Hollister Ave., Goleta, CA 93117 USA Telephone 805-685-1006, Fax 805-685-6869 Website http://www.eiffel.comhttp://www.eiffel.com Customer support http://support.eiffel.comhttp://support.eiffel.com ]"
end -- class ../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xmlEV_CELL_IMP
